Go back in time to witness historical events firsthand, such as the signing of the Declaration of Independence or the fall of the Berlin Wall.
Visit different eras to see how people lived and worked, such as ancient Rome or medieval Europe.
Explore different parts of the world that are currently inaccessible due to geopolitical or environmental issues, such as Antarctica or Chernobyl.
Meet famous historical figures and learn from their experiences and insights.
Visit different dimensions or alternate realities to explore new possibilities and perspectives.
